resources.string: Free Fire requires access for {%s} in order to run. Please click Go to manage the access restrictions of the app.
You may still change access in Settings.
Free Fire requires Bluetooth access to enable the use of wireless earphones.
In order for Free Fire to run, please allow Free Fire to save important account information, updates and images to your device.
Free Fire would like to use notifications to keep you informed about the latest events and updates.
Please allow Free Fire access to your microphone for in-game voice chat and recording. You can manage this under Settings.
[Allow access to Read Data] Record users account information for quick login; save game updates and photos
